changeSet.author: Bonnie
changeSet.comment: run all xx_V.sql to create view tables
changeSet.createView: selectC.KEMID,CL.SEC_RPT_GRP,C.sec_id,C.regis_cd,C.HLDG_IP_IND,sum(C.HLDG_UNITS) as UNITS,sum(HLDG_COST) as CARRY_VAL,sum(HLDG_MVAL) as MARKET_VAL,sum(HLDG_NEXT_FY_EST_INC) as NEXT_FY_EST_INC,sum(HLDG_FY_REM_EST_INC) as FY_REM_EST_INC,sum(HLDG_ANNL_INC_EST) as ANNL_INC_ESTfrom END_CRNT_TAX_LOT_BAL_T C, END_SEC_T S, END_CLS_CD_T CLwhere C.sec_id = S.sec_idand s.SEC_CLS_CD = CL.SEC_CLS_CDgroup by C.KEMID, CL.SEC_RPT_GRP, C.HLDG_IP_IND, C.sec_id, C.regis_cd

changeSet.author: Bonnie
changeSet.comment: run all xx_V.sql to create view tables
changeSet.createView: select C.KEMID, CL.SEC_RPT_GRP, C.sec_id, C.regis_cd, C.HLDG_IP_IND, sum(C.HLDG_UNITS) as UNITS, sum(HLDG_COST) as CARRY_VAL, sum(HLDG_MVAL) as MARKET_VAL, sum(HLDG_NEXT_FY_EST_INC) as NEXT_FY_EST_INC, sum(HLDG_FY_REM_EST_INC) as FY_REM_EST_INC, sum(HLDG_ANNL_INC_EST) as ANNL_INC_EST from END_CRNT_TAX_LOT_BAL_T C, END_SEC_T S, END_CLS_CD_T CL where C.sec_id = S.sec_id and s.SEC_CLS_CD = CL.SEC_CLS_CD group by C.KEMID, CL.SEC_RPT_GRP, C.HLDG_IP_IND, C.sec_id, C.regis_cd
